description:
Note: this is forked from https://github.com/react-bootstrap/react-overlays/blob/master/src/Transition.js
  so that it works with css modules. The internals are pretty different now, but it has roughly the same api.

in.description: Show the component? Triggers the enter or exit animation.

unmountOnExit.description: Unmount the component (remove it from the DOM) when it is not shown.

transitionOnMount.description:
Run the enter animation when the component mounts, if it is initially
shown

onTransition.description: Callback fired when transitioning to the next state

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the "entering" classes are applied

onEntering.description: Callback fired after the "entering" classes are applied

onEntered.description: Callback fired after the "enter" classes are applied

onExit.description: Callback fired before the "exiting" classes are applied

onExiting.description: Callback fired after the "exiting" classes are applied

onExited.description: Callback fired after the "exited" classes are applied

children.description: A single element to animate in and out

elementRef.description: provides a reference to the underlying html root element

enterDelay.description:
A Timeout for the animation, in milliseconds, to ensure that a node doesn't
transition indefinately if the browser transitionEnd events are
canceled or interrupted.

By default this is set to a high number (5 seconds) as a failsafe. You should consider
setting this to the duration of your animation (or a bit above it).

exitDelay.description:
A Timeout for the animation, in milliseconds, to ensure that a node doesn't
transition indefinately if the browser transitionEnd events are
canceled or interrupted.

By default this is set to a high number (5 seconds) as a failsafe. You should consider
setting this to the duration of your animation (or a bit above it).

transitionClassName.description: the base CSS class for the transition (transitions go here)

exitedClassName.description: CSS class or classes applied when the component is exited

exitingClassName.description: CSS class or classes applied while the component is exiting

enteredClassName.description: CSS class or classes applied when the component is entered

enteringClassName.description: CSS class or classes applied while the component is entering

title: index
